attributes.action: Stop the harassment and victimization of 'Tommy Robinson' and his family.
attributes.background: 'Tommy Robinson' (Stephen Yaxley Lennon) Former EDL leader, now PEGIDA UK and his family are being constantly and unfairly victimized by Police forces across the UK.

rejection.details:
If you are concerned about policing in Cambridgeshire, you could report your concerns to the local elected Police and Crime Commissioner:

http://www.cambridgeshire-pcc.gov.uk/

The Independent Police Complaints Commission, not the Government or Parliament, conducts independent investigations of the police. You can find out more about the IPCC, including how to make a complaint, here:

https://www.ipcc.gov.uk/complaints
